verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A refuge for the poor,
a shelter for the storm:
this is our God.
He will wipe away your tears
and return your wasted years:
this is our God.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
So call upon His name,
He is mighty to save:
this is our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A father to the orphan,
a healer to the broken:
this is our God.
He brings peace to our madness
and comfort in our sadness:
this is our God.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is the One we have waited for.
This is the One we have waited for.
This is the One we have waited for.
Jesus, Lord and Savior:
This is our God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
A fountain for the thirsty,
a lover for the lonely:
this is our God.
He brings glory to the humble
and crowns for the faithful:
this is our God.
